comment.author: 63334811@N00
comment._content: ★ This photo has been blogged! Using Flickr's "Blog This" feature, this brilliant image of yours is highlighted on vivaca.blogspot.com today (or in the near future). Vivaca is a non-profit celebration of vicarious vacationing via images, like this one, from around the globe. Check it out! And please leave a comment, if you are so inclined. Vivaca readers - myself included - would love to learn more about this image or series of images from The Library of Congress, and how the library is bringing its expansive collection of public domain photographs online. Buon viaggio! ★ And here it is: vivaca.blogspot.com/2010/06/hello-gorgeous-wow.html
